name: places/ChIJI2jnuqD2wokRKBDRH4tAxVs
formattedAddress: 20 Magaw Pl, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 20 Magaw Pl, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Sophia is, hands down, the best massage therapist I have ever worked with. She is attentive, smart, thoughtful, and very very good at what she does. I have chronic pain in my neck/shoulder and seeing her is one of the only things that offers me release. She's also incredibly communicative -- letting me know how things are doing, where stress points are, and offers suggestions on how to work through pain points on your own at home. I cannot recommend Sophia enough.

text.text: Sophia is, hands down, the best massage therapist I have ever worked with. She is attentive, smart, thoughtful, and very very good at what she does. I have chronic pain in my neck/shoulder and seeing her is one of the only things that offers me release. She's also incredibly communicative -- letting me know how things are doing, where stress points are, and offers suggestions on how to work through pain points on your own at home. I cannot recommend Sophia enough.

originalText.text:
UPDATE (8/2020) - At a time like this I was thrilled to be back in Sophia's care. Her space is clean and organized. She clearly takes pride in maintaining a healthy work environment and cares about protecting her clients. I feel very comfortable being under her care and can't wait to continue with her!

I had the pleasure of receiving prenatal massages from Sophia. She is skillfully trained in a variety of techniques and is very careful to assess your needs before beginning each session. Sophia made sure I was comfortable during each session, adjusting her techniques as needed throughout my pregnancy. The relief felt for days after each session is completely worth the time and money spent. Although I haven't had the chance yet I can't wait to go back to Sophia for my postnatal massage!

originalText.text: This is the first time I've seen a massage therapist since the pandemic started and I felt totally safe at Sophia's due to her care and concern with safety protocols. She is a strong and intuitive massage therapist, someone who really understands how the body works and pain travels. Her technique is familiar in some ways but also entirely unique. A day later, my shoulder feels so much better. I recommend her as a thoughtful and competent therapist.

originalText.text: Sophia is one of the best massage therapists I have ever seen. She is very attentive to problem areas on the body, and afterwards she sat down with me and gave advice on ways to stretch and massage at home. I'd recommend her to anyone!

text.text: Sophia is one of the best massage therapists I have ever seen. She is very attentive to problem areas on the body, and afterwards she sat down with me and gave advice on ways to stretch and massage at home. I'd recommend her to anyone!

originalText.text: I actually found Sophia via a Google Maps search while looking for a masseuse in my neighborhood, and it was a stroke of luck that I did. Sophia got back to me right away, and was able to see me the next day.  She is professional, warm, and very, very good at her job. When I left the pain that I had was gone. I've honestly not experienced that much relief before from a massage. Also, her place is lovely - sunny and clean and welcoming. I even bought a 5 pack before I left. I highly recommend her!
